item.title: At Justice Dept., Bove Suggested Violating Court Orders, Whistle-Blower Says
item.description: Emil Bove III, a Trump judicial nominee, voiced his intent to disobey court orders as others stonewalled and misled judges, according to a complaint.

item.title: US Heat Wave: Latest Forecast for the East Coast
item.description: This week is delivering the hottest temperatures of the year so far to much of the eastern United States.
